expected_answer.root_cause: Database connection timeout - query exceeded 30 second limit
expected_answer.impact: Complete failure of GET /api/users endpoint affecting all user list requests
expected_answer.suggested_action: Review database query performance, add appropriate indexes, consider connection pooling, or adjust timeout configuration

llm_answer.root_cause: TimeoutError - Connection timeout after exceeding a 30 second limit
llm_answer.impact: GET /api/users endpoint failed resulting in all user list requests being affected with an HTTP status code of 500
llm_answer.suggested_action: Increase the database query timeout to at least 60 seconds or optimize the SELECT statement by adding appropriate indexes, specifically on users.active column

results.test_name: Null Pointer Exception in Service Layer

expected_answer.root_cause: NullPointerException when accessing customer.getAddress() - customer object was null
expected_answer.impact: Order creation endpoint completely broken, blocking all new order submissions
expected_answer.suggested_action: Add null validation for customer object, implement proper error handling, and validate input data before processing

llm_answer.root_cause: NullPointerException in OrderService.createOrder - Null customer object
llm_answer.impact: POST /api/orders endpoint failed for all requests within the last hour with HTTP status code 500, affecting user order submissions
llm_answer.suggested_action: Validate and handle null objects before invoking methods; consider adding a NullChecker middleware or implementing input validation in OrderService.createOrder method

expected_answer.root_cause: Third-party weather API rate limit exceeded (HTTP 429)
expected_answer.impact: Weather service unavailable for next 3600 seconds (1 hour), all weather requests failing
expected_answer.suggested_action: Implement response caching, add rate limiting on client side, consider upgrading API tier, or implement fallback weather provider

llm_answer.root_cause: RateLimitError due to exceeded rate limit of requests per minute
llm_answer.impact: HTTP GET request for weatherapi.com failed with status code 429 affecting all subsequent attempts within the next hour
llm_answer.suggested_action: Increase API call frequency or implement a backoff strategy; review and adjust rate limit settings in configuration to align with service policy

expected_answer.root_cause: OutOfMemoryError - heap memory maxed out at 4096MB during batch image processing
expected_answer.impact: Background job failure causing image processing backlog and service degradation
expected_answer.suggested_action: Reduce batch size, implement streaming processing, increase heap size, or add memory cleanup between iterations

llm_answer.impact: BackgroundJob.processImages operation failed for all image processing tasks within a batch size of 1000 images affecting the entire system's ability to process new and pending images, resulting in an OutOfMemoryError with Java heap space being maxed out at 4096MB
llm_answer.suggested_action: Increase memory allocation for JVM by setting -Xmx8192MB; optimize image processing algorithm or batch size to reduce peak memory usage

expected_answer.root_cause: JWT token expired - exceeded 1 hour TTL
expected_answer.impact: User authentication failed, blocking access to protected profile endpoint
expected_answer.suggested_action: Implement automatic token refresh using refresh tokens, or redirect user to login page

llm_answer.impact: GET /api/profile endpoint failed with 401 status code, affecting all profile retrieval requests by users within the next hour based on token TTL of 3600 seconds.
llm_answer.suggested_action: Increase auth.token.ttl to at least 7200 seconds or implement refresh tokens mechanism.

expected_answer.root_cause: Database deadlock between 2 concurrent transactions attempting to update same account records
expected_answer.impact: Transfer transaction failed and rolled back, funds not transferred, user sees error
expected_answer.suggested_action: Implement transaction retry mechanism with exponential backoff, use consistent lock ordering, or switch to optimistic concurrency control

llm_answer.root_cause: DeadlockError during UPDATE accounts operation in MySQL
llm_answer.impact: POST /api/transfer endpoint failed for all users due to a Deadlock error affecting the payment-service's ability to process transactions, resulting in HTTP status code: 500
llm_answer.suggested_action: Review and optimize transaction isolation levels; consider implementing retry logic with exponential backoff. Ensure proper indexing on accounts table.

expected_answer.root_cause: Permission denied error - application process lacks write access to /var/uploads directory
expected_answer.impact: All file uploads failing, users cannot save documents to system
expected_answer.suggested_action: Update directory permissions (chmod) or change directory owner (chown) to grant write access to application user

llm_answer.root_cause: PermissionError - EACCES: permission denied on file '/var/uploads/file.pdf'
llm_answer.impact: POST /api/upload endpoint failed with HTTP status code 500, affecting all users attempting to upload files via this service.
llm_answer.suggested_action: Increase permissions for the directory and file '/var/uploads/' by running 'chmod -R 755 /var/uploads'.

expected_answer.root_cause: Circuit breaker in OPEN state due to 15 failures exceeding threshold of 10
expected_answer.impact: All recommendation requests fast-failing without attempting call, feature unavailable for 60 seconds
expected_answer.suggested_action: Investigate and fix upstream recommendation service failures, monitor circuit breaker metrics, consider implementing fallback response

llm_answer.root_cause: CircuitBreakerOpenError - Circuit breaker is OPEN due to failure count exceeding threshold of 10
llm_answer.impact: GET /api/recommendations endpoint failed with HTTP status code 503, affecting all recommendation retrieval requests within the last hour
llm_answer.suggested_action: Increase circuit breaker.threshold to 20 and monitor error rates closely

expected_answer.root_cause: Invalid JSON syntax - unexpected token '}' at position 45 in request body
expected_answer.impact: Event cannot be created, request rejected immediately with 400 error
expected_answer.suggested_action: Add client-side JSON validation, improve error messages to help client identify malformed data, consider JSON schema validation

llm_answer.impact: POST /api/events endpoint failed due to invalid JSON payload resulting in HTTP status code 400 for all requests within the last minute
llm_answer.suggested_action: Validate and sanitize incoming request payloads before processing; implement a try-catch block around JSON.parse with error logging

expected_answer.root_cause: SSL certificate expired - partner API certificate expired on 2024-01-15, 15 days ago
expected_answer.impact: All requests to partner API failing, external data integration completely broken
expected_answer.suggested_action: Contact partner-api.example.com administrator to renew certificate, implement certificate expiry monitoring, consider temporary fallback data source

llm_answer.root_cause: SSLCertificateError - SSL certificate verification failed due to expired certificate
llm_answer.impact: HTTPS GET request for partner-api.example.com endpoint resulted in an error, affecting all external data retrieval operations from integration-service's /api/external-data operation.
llm_answer.suggested_action: Update the SSL certificate on integration-service and verify its validity before making HTTPS requests to https://partner-api.example.com
